trans-unit.source: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using Azure PowerShell| Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using Azure PowerShell| Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create clusters for Azure HDInsight by using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create clusters for Azure HDInsight by using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using Azure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Create Windows-based Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using Azure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create HDInsight clusters using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell is a module that provides cmdlets to manage Azure with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell is a module that provides cmdlets to manage Azure with Windows PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: For other cluster creation tools and features click the tab select on the top of this page or see [Cluster creation methods](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#cluster-creation-methods).
trans-unit.target: For other cluster creation tools and features click the tab select on the top of this page or see [Cluster creation methods](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#cluster-creation-methods).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites:

trans-unit.source: Before you begin the instructions in this article, you must have the following:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin the instructions in this article, you must have the following:

trans-unit.source: Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: See [Install Azure PowerShell 1.0](hdinsight-administer-use-powershell.md#install-azure-powershell-10-and-greater).
trans-unit.target: See [Install Azure PowerShell 1.0](hdinsight-administer-use-powershell.md#install-azure-powershell-10-and-greater).

trans-unit.source: Create clusters
trans-unit.target: Create clusters

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell is a powerful scripting environment that you can use to control and automate the deployment and management of your workloads in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell is a powerful scripting environment that you can use to control and automate the deployment and management of your workloads in Azure.

trans-unit.source: This section provides instructions on how to create an HDInsight cluster by using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This section provides instructions on how to create an HDInsight cluster by using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: For information on configuring a workstation to run HDInsight Windows PowerShell cmdlets, see [Install and configure Azure PowerShell](../powershell-install-configure.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on configuring a workstation to run HDInsight Windows PowerShell cmdlets, see [Install and configure Azure PowerShell](../powershell-install-configure.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information on using Azure PowerShell with HDInsight, see [Administer HDInsight using PowerShell](hdinsight-administer-use-powershell.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on using Azure PowerShell with HDInsight, see [Administer HDInsight using PowerShell](hdinsight-administer-use-powershell.md).

trans-unit.source: For the list of the HDInsight Windows PowerShell cmdlets, see [HDInsight cmdlet reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn858087.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For the list of the HDInsight Windows PowerShell cmdlets, see [HDInsight cmdlet reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn858087.aspx).

trans-unit.source: The following procedures are needed to create an HDInsight cluster by using Azure PowerShell:
trans-unit.target: The following procedures are needed to create an HDInsight cluster by using Azure PowerShell:

trans-unit.source: Create clusters using ARM template
trans-unit.target: Create clusters using ARM template

trans-unit.source: You can use Azure PowerShell to deploy an ARM template which creates an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can use Azure PowerShell to deploy an ARM template which creates an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: See [Call templates using Azure PowerShell](hdinsight-hadoop-create-windows-clusters-arm-templates.md#call-templates-using-powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Call templates using Azure PowerShell](hdinsight-hadoop-create-windows-clusters-arm-templates.md#call-templates-using-powershell).

trans-unit.source: Customize clusters
trans-unit.target: Customize clusters

trans-unit.source: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Bootstrap](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster-bootstrap.md#use-azure-powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Bootstrap](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster-bootstrap.md#use-azure-powershell).

trans-unit.source: See [Customize Windows-based HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call-scripts-using-azure-powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize Windows-based HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call-scripts-using-azure-powershell).

trans-unit.target: In this article, you have learned several ways to create an HDInsight cluster.
